channel.title: Adam Wood Test Site
channel.description: Recent content on Adam Wood Test Site

item.title: Today I Learned a Thing
item.description: Today I Learned a Thing What have I learned? This is my fist time using Hugo. I have to say it’s incredibly simple and I have been able to knock this site together in literally less than 10 minutes. What am I going to do with it? I’m going to use this as the basis for a test site which I will create in AWS in order to get Signavio’s site up and running.
